channel.title: Administration on DevDiary
channel.description: Recent content in Administration on DevDiary

item.title: How to schedule job on Ubuntu?
item.description: For scheduling job you should use Cron. It is a time-based job scheduler.

item.title: How to synchronize folders' content automatically on Ubuntu?
item.description: To synchronize folders’ content on Ubuntu you can use Rsync. It is a tool designed specially for that purposes.

item.title: How to reload kernel modules responsible for bluetooth on Ubuntu 18.04?
item.description: Bluetooth in my laptop from time to time crash. Restarting kernel modules could be useful to easy and quick fix it.
